text: No mu Barabu bo mu cyaro harimo abemera Allah n’umunsi w'imperuka, bakanabona ko ibyo batanga (mu nzira ya Allah) ari ibibegereza Allah, bikaba n’impamvu yo gusabirwa n’Intumwa. Mumenye ko mu by’ukuri ibyo bibegereza (Allah) koko. Allah azabinjiza mu mpuhwe ze (Ijuru). Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe
